isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - ALCOHOL EVAPORATOR (BENDIX AE-1) - ENGINE AIR CLEANER INDUCTION

svcproc.title: ENGINE AIR CLEANER INDUCTION
svcproc.para: This kit is used when the compressor inlet is connected to the engine air cleaner on the engine intake manifold and the engine is naturally aspirated (not supercharged or turbocharged). A single check valve "A" is employed in this installation and depending on evaporator used may be connected directly to the evaporator, or connected to the governor ( Figure 90 ).

note.para: Line "B" is connected to the unloader port of the governor.

svcproc.para: When the compressor is unloaded (not compressing air), the air pressure in line "B" holds the check valve "A" closed and prohibits alcohol from being drawn into line "C" thus stopping any possible flow of alcohol from the jar into the engine intake.
